page.title: 14GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: These are the games which we most enjoy playing at playtime. They are called{Stick-in-the-mud, Hop-Scotch {Chasey, Trains, The Farmer's in his {Den and Ring a Ring of Roses.}The older children play{Stick-in-the-mud and{Hop-Scotch}and we play{The {Farmer's in his Den and Ring a Ring of {Roses}with the younger children. In{Stick-in-the-mud}you choose someone to be "on" and if you're "on" you chase people. If you are caught you stand with your legs apart until someone crawls between your legs and frees you to run again. We have a{Hop-Scotch}pattern on the yard. It is marked in numbers 1 to 10. To play it properly you get a stone and throw it on to number 1. If it lands on the line you miss a go. The first person to get to 10 wins.
